    • createColorMap

      protected Map<Color,Integer> createColorMap(List<CharacterCard> characters)
      Creates a HashMap that maps each specified character card to its corresponding color count.
      Parameters:
      characters - the characters available
      Returns:
      Map where the keys are colors associated with the specified character cards and the values are the counts of cards of that color in the given list.
